title: How to Make Grape Pie

steps.headline: Roll out half of the pastry and fill a 8–9 inch (20.3–22.9 cm) ceramic or pie dish.
In a bowl combine the grapes, sugar, flour, salt, pepper, port or wine and mix gently.
Pile into the bottom pie dish.
steps.description: Dot the filling with the butter.

steps.headline: Roll out the rest of the pastry and cover the filling and seal the edges.
With a knife, make slits on the pie top to create air vents.
Reduce the oven temperature to 375 degrees, and cook the pie for 35 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
Allow to stand for about 30-60 minutes.
Drizzle with more port if desired and serve.

text: Preheat oven to 450 degrees.  Roll out half of the pastry and fill a 8–9 inch (20.3–22.9 cm) ceramic or pie dish.  In a bowl combine the grapes, sugar, flour, salt, pepper, port or wine and mix gently.  Pile into the bottom pie dish. Dot the filling with the butter. Roll out the rest of the pastry and cover the filling and seal the edges.  With a knife, make slits on the pie top to create air vents.  Sprinkle the top with sugar.  Microwave for 10 minutes.  Reduce the oven temperature to 375 degrees, and cook the pie for 35 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.  Allow to stand for about 30-60 minutes.  Drizzle with more port if desired and serve. Enjoy! Finished.
